HOUSE BILL/RESOLUTION HISTORY
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01772
ADOPTED AS RESOLUTION NO. HR00142
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION REQUESTING HIS EXCELLENCY, PRESIDENT RODRIGO ROA DUTERTE, TO INCREASE THE BUDGET FOR FY 2019 FOR THE PROGRAMS/PROJECTS FOR MICRO, SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISES (MSMEs), SPECIFICALLY THE KAPATID MENTOR ME PROGRAM, THE SHARED SERVICE FACILITIES PROJECT AND THE TRADE FAIRS OF THE BUREAU OF DOMESTIC TRADE PROMOTION
SHORT TITLE : Resolution Requesting His Excellency, President Rodrigo Roa Duterte, To Increase The Budget For Fy 2019 For The Programs/projects For Micro, Small And Medium Enterprises (msmes), Specifically The Kapatid Mentor Me Program, The Shared Service Facilities Project And The Trade Fairs Of The Bureau Of Domestic Trade Promotion
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : UNABIA, PETER "SR. PEDRO" M., LIMKAICHONG, JOCELYN SY, GONZAGA, RUWEL PETER S., ABELLANOSA, RODRIGO A., ACOSTA, GIL P., PANOTES, MARISOL C., MARQUEZ, CARLITO S., MONTORO, TEODORO "TED" G., VILLARAZA-SUAREZ, ANNA MARIE
DATE FILED : 2018-03-13
